rows.text_1::eng: Take a moment to check in with yourself.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1::eng: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2::eng: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3::eng: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!
